attributes.action: To write into law that every public building should fly the union flag.
attributes.additional_details: Time to stop knocking everything British and start celebrating our rich history and traditions, being proud to wave our union flag. Being proud of your country is not racist, its patriotic, Britain has contributed so much to the world that we should be proud off and the union flag symbolises all that is good in Britain.
attributes.background: All public buildings and institutions should fly the union flag, schools, libraries, swimming pools, council buildings etc, time to be proud of Britain and its history.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:
